name: energy-root
effect: Used on a party Pokémon : Restores 200 HP. Decreases happiness by 10/10/15.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: A very bitter root. It restores the HP of one Pokémon by 200 points.
flavor_text.platinum: A very bitter root. It restores the HP of one Pokémon by 200 points.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: A very bitter root. It restores the HP of one Pokémon by 200 points.
